name: Sage Solitaire - in luxe
description:
- Remade in the luxe game engine -

 Originally released by Zach Gage (http://www.stfj.net/)

 - How To Play -

To play select cards with left mouse button and make poker like hands(e.g 2-pair, 5-straight, Full House etc.) and then click the button that appears at the top of the screen. You may see a list of hands by hovering over the "?" button and if you click it you will be given a hint. Additional you may select and discard/trash individual cards. You have 2 trashes and gain 1 back when you make a successful hand. The game ends when you are out of trashes and valid plays.

(note: web version may not work in chrome on mac. if not try firefox. Additionally the highscore is only tracked on pc/mac/linux builds)
